fields.name: ApplicationId
fields.description: The application ID, also known as client ID, of the service principal.

fields.name: Password
fields.description: The password of the service principal.

fields.name: PrincipalId
fields.description: The principal ID, also known as the object ID, of the service principal.

fields.name: TenantId
fields.description: The tenant ID, also known as the directory ID, of the tenant in which the service principal is created.
